featured.text: Worst of all, their stings can be fatal to livestock and humans.
Besides, soybeans can be fed to a variety of other animals ranging from livestock to silk worms.

definition.zh_def: 家畜，指用於農業生產的動物，如牛、羊、豬等。
definition.en_def: Farm animals raised for commercial purposes, such as cattle, sheep, and pigs.
definition.example: The farmer decided to expand his livestock by adding more sheep and goats.
